verses.text: Ach in Diosal, il in koti. Tz'el wav yuj yaelal tzin ik'ani. Cha ab' in lesal.
Ato b'aj slajwik'och sti' lum lum tik tzin awaj t'ayach, tz'el yip in pixan swab'i. Ik' in k'e t'a yib'anh junok niwan k'een yic tzin colchaji.
Ha ach ayachoch in colnab'iloc. Icha junok cuartel aj t'ayin, tzin a col t'a heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
In gana tzin kajnaj t'a a kajnub' t'a masanil tiempo. In gana tzin k'ub'ej in b'ha t'a yalanh a wach'k'olal, icha nok' yunetac caxlanh t'a yalanh sk'axil snun.
Ach in Diosal, ab'nac tas in ti' wak'nac t'ayach, ix ak' in macb'en yet' heb' ay elk'och t'ay.
Najatokab' tzutej in k 'inal a in rey in tik. Niwanokab' ab'il swila'
yic swak'an yajalil t'a ichanh. Tanhwej in yet' a wach'k'olal, yujto tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala'.
Icha chi' ol ach in b'itej t'a masanil tiempo. Junjun k'u ol in k'anab'ajan b'aj wak'nac in ti' chi' t'ayach.
